item.title: Exploratory Data Analysis
item.description: These datasets were taken from the Internet. Two datasets were used: one includes data about the Bechdel test score of each movie, while the other includes information about the top 250 movies on IMDB. The USboxOfficeInf variable is the US box office total that has been inflated to the current 2019 value. The dataset of the IMDB movies was found on the website data.world. I choose these two datasets because I like movies a lot and was curious to see how the top 250 movies ranked on the Bechdel test.

item.title: Project2
item.description: Sruti Gorantla, sg42899 #0 #install.packages("psych") library(psych) library(tidyverse) data(msqR) #removed alone, kindly and scornful because most of the values were NA select<-dplyr::select msqR<-msqR%>%dplyr::select(-film,-alone,-kindly,-scornful) #had to manually recode gender so it would be categorical than numeric msqR$gender<-recode(msqR$gender,'1'="male", '2'="female") #had to manually recode drug so it would be binary msqR$drug<-recode(msqR$drug,'1'=0, '2'=1) msqR<-msqR%>%na.omit The msqR dataset is a large dataset containing the MSQ (Motivational State Questionnaire) scores of various participants to study emotions. A subset of this data includes an experiment where participants where given caffeine or a placebo drug and their various emotions where then scored using the MSQ.

item.title: Projects Page
item.description: Here are the projects I have completed This project 1 involved using data wrangling and exploratory analysis on the top 200 IMDB movies. This project 2 involved using statistical modeling, infering and predicting to see the relationship of caffeine and gender on a person's mood.

item.title: Python Post
item.description: Python I used regex in python to extract certain key words from sentences. In this example, I extracted numbers from a string. import re string1="We have to extract these numbers 12, 47, 48 The integers numbers are also interesting: 189 2036 314\',\' is a separator, so please extract these numbers 125,789,1450 and also these 564,90456 We like to offer you 7890$ per month in order to complete this task... we are joking" print(string1) ## We have to extract these numbers 12, 47, 48 The integers numbers are also interesting: 189 2036 314',' is a separator, so please extract these numbers 125,789,1450 and also these 564,90456 We like to offer you 7890$ per month in order to complete this task.
